title: Offshoot
overview: She has just been appointed as Head, Investigation and Operations of the NDA after the demise of her boss. As she is fondly called, sees this as an opportunity to prove that she is more than capable of ridding the country of the drug menace that has been plaguing it in recent times. She immediately hits the ground running with several successful raids and quickly catches the attention of the drug cartel. When she starts to receive death threats, her husband becomes worried and tries to talk her out of pursuing the cartel so aggressively but for her, there is no turning back. It's all or nothing. Her constant refusal to see reason even when the threats intensify and involve their daughter greatly annoys Dike and puts a strain on their relationship. In a bid to save his wife and family as a whole. Her husband has to make the best and worst decision of his life, taking them both on a roller coaster journey that threatens her job, their marriage and eventually maybe even her sanity.

title: Chapter 51
overview: "Fake documentary" using every film stock.

title: The Du Pont Engagement
overview: In 1920s England, Harry Du Pont, heir to the Du Pont empire is murdered at his engagement party, it’s up to Inspector Wilbur Wright to unravel the mysteries of the Du Pont family.
tagline: A MURDER MOST MALICIOUS

title: Thirst
overview: An oil-stained motorcycle enthusiast seeks a place in the new world of green energy. His wife, a strong supporter of the philosophy of sustainable development, suffers from kidney failure. The spouses are no longer united by common values, but by the serious illness. Mechanic looking for ways to cover the cost of a kidney transplant gets sucked into the world of crime. At the same time, his wife Anna is developing a radically different view of the world around her. Will the heroes be able to find their way to each other?

title: Keedaa Cola
overview: Vaasthu, Lancham, and Thatha stumble upon a cockroach in a cola bottle and devise a plan to profit by filing a case in the consumer court. Simultaneously, Jeevan, an egocentric local thug with political aspirations, gains momentum as his brother, Naidu, is released from a 20-year prison sentence. The convergence of these two distinct worlds brings forth unexpected and hilarious consequences for everyone involved.
tagline: Swaasa Meeda Dhyaasa Osthunaam...

title: Global Spyware Scandal: Exposing Pegasus
overview: FRONTLINE and Forbidden Films investigate Pegasus, a powerful spyware sold to governments around the world by the Israeli company NSO Group.

title: Gutter
overview: Raised in poverty, Gutter realizes thriving in this world, means embracing the streets that made him.
tagline: Embrace the streets that made you.

title: Shaan
overview: The story of the film revolves around Shaan, who, after passing the Bangladesh Civil Service examinations, joins the police force to serve the nation. He is an honest and courageous police officer.
tagline: A MAN AGAINST INHUMANITY !!

title: Sideshow
overview: When two inept criminals break into the home of a washed-up psychic in search of hidden loot, they get a lot more than they bargained for.
tagline: Magic, mayhem, murder... Not even a psychic could predict a night like this.

title: Leha
overview: Leha and her boyfriend Zaman work in the local industrial factory. Their lives are in danger when they find a file that documents the illegal works committed by Dato Murad, the owner of the factory.

title: Cani randagi
overview: Two families compete for criminal control of a part of Salento; a good man finds himself on the battlefield driven by a deep love.

title: Baptized by Fire
overview: A seemingly regular visit to a dealer in the slums of Lagos takes an unexpected turn and forces this anxious stoner on a different kind of trip.
tagline: There are some trips you don't come back from.

title: Crime à Ramatuelle
overview: Sébastien Lacassagne, 35, owner of a wine estate, was assassinated with a statuette in his house. The investigation conducted by Prosecutor Elisabeth Richard and Captain Caroline Martinez reveals many gray areas in the victim's life.

title: Rifle Ganj
overview: A young talented Engineer & Civil Services topper, Chandar turns into a naxal commander when the abuse of power and politics result in his sister's kidnapping and death of his much respected grandfather.
tagline: a violent hope

title: Lottie
overview: Two mob guys have to take out one of the boss's mistresses.
tagline: Looks like she off-ed herself

title: Fallen Angels Murder Club: Heroes and Felons
overview: The members of the Fallen Angels Murder Club must band together again as they search for answers surrounding the death of one of their own. Hollis Morgan  finds herself at the center of the investigation when a journalist reporting on the murder also winds up dead.  As bodies begin to stack up, and Hollis connects the dots, she must solve the murders before it's too late.

title: Nothing Goes
overview: A university student's life begins to spiral out of control after reluctantly being involved in a robbery, leading to a road trip which will change his life forever.

title: Max & Marguerite
overview: Max and Marguerite are just a regular suburban couple with perfectly standard and adequate lives. Suddenly, this is all thrown into jeopardy due to the unfortunate unravelling of a complex web of misunderstandings, coincidences and deceit.
tagline: The infamous tight spot that's claimed so many...

title: Night of the Hunter
overview: A blind adaptation of a principal scene from the screenplay of "The Night of the Hunter" (1955).  (Click the "TRAILER" link to view the film on YouTube!)

title: Sherlock Holmes: Memories of Murder
overview: Sherlock Holmes is forced to confront his age and health condition as he struggles to solve the murder of a fellow detective.

title: Mordach:  Death in the Mountains
overview: The notion that he embarked on a journey to the picturesque Mordach solely for the purpose of hiking finds no credence in the eyes of Frankfurt's BKA official, Cuma Ozan, following the discovery of a corpse. His local colleagues, in fact, entertain suspicions of him being the perpetrator in the case of Laura Brunner's murder.

title: Beauty Boxed
overview: Young take of a girl breaking chains out of her early child marriage to pursue a dream of becoming a makeup artist.
tagline: Freedom. Fire and Will. All comes with fight.

title: Palayam PC
overview: A middle-aged police constable, prefers to take night duty at an aid post in Palayam which is relatively risk-free and quite peaceful. Things changed when he was assigned protection duty for the female activist who was under public threat.
tagline: Dream Big. Dreams Come True.

title: Scenes From Tuesday
overview: A story of a man who's luck gets the better of him.
tagline: Luck never wins.

title: Player
overview: A young man plays the field, dating multiple women at the same time until something tragic happens, and he is charged with a crime he did not commit. Or did he?

title: 23 - Der mysteriöse Tod eines Hackers
overview: documentary about the mysterious death of german hacker Karl Koch aka hagbard.

title: Beyond Human Nature
overview: When a man is murdered by drowning in a paper pulp vat, a small town clamors for justice and his brother comes face to face with the slippery nature of objective truth. 'Beyond Human Nature' chronicles the grisly Tom Monfils homicide investigation of 1992 through the eyes of the people who lived it.
tagline: This factory has worked _ days without a murder.

title: Whatever it Takes
overview: In the summer of 2019, a middle-aged couple are subjected to cyberstalking threats and bizarre deliveries including a bloody pig mask and funeral wreath. As the harassment intensifies, the police and FBI close in on a Silicon Valley giant and some very unlikely suspects. "Whatever It Takes" tells the extraordinary story of eBay, a Fortune 500 company founded on the principle that "people are basically good”, and how members of their security team ended up in federal prison after trying to protect the CEO from a corporate raider.

title: Booyah!
overview: Amadeu needs money, he and Gina are in trouble.Fate smiles on him when he finds a bag stuffed with a small fortune, which he ends up hiding. Now Gina has to find out where Amadeu kept the bag. But she's not the only one on the hunt for this fortune.

title: Jenseits des Rechts
overview: The case of a young man found dead leads Inspector Cris Blohm and her colleague Dennis Eden into the amateur porn scene and to Mia, the daughter of well-known Munich businessman Ralph Horschalek who fears greatly for his good reputation. Then Cris Blohm is leaked information that could lead to the perpetrator but which, due to legal loopholes, may not be used. The investigation is blocked. In a precarious situation, she decides to pursue her most urgent suspicion nonetheless – even if it is on the edge of legality.

title: Aakhir Palaayan Kab Tak..?
overview: A cop faces personal struggles in a deceptive town where dark forces exploit community sentiments. The movie explores themes of greed, community manipulation, and personal redemption.

title: The Hunt for America's Deadliest Hitman
overview: The gripping YouTube video delves into the intense pursuit of America's deadliest hitman. Filled with suspense and investigative depth, it explores the challenges faced by law enforcement in tracking down this elusive figure. The video provides a chilling glimpse into the criminal underworld and the tireless efforts to bring a dangerous individual to justice.
tagline: The story of José Manuel Martinez.

title: Punish Evil
overview: a police action film about the united efforts of my country's public security agencies in the 1990s to combat illegal and criminal activities and uphold social justice. In the 1990s, a small city in the south named Binhai suffered a series of heinous and brutal robberies. Xu Zhengyang, an upright police officer from the north, came to Binhai to support Song Hai, the local criminal investigation team leader, in solving the case. The gangster group headed by Zhuang Zhiqiang, who was arrogant in their abilities and brutal attributes, each gave full play to their strengths. After a battle of wits and courage, the two finally annihilated the gangster group headed by Zhuang Zhiqiang in one fell swoop.

title: Maruthi Nagar Police Station
overview: A group of four youngsters band together to eliminate a police officer and a notorious gangster who are responsible for the death of their friend. But they are left baffled when someone else does the job for them.

title: Iron Temple
overview: IFBB Pro Tony Torres built a lucrative lifestyle which came crashing down after covering for a friend who committed a murder. After being chased by the FBI he was sent to prison for five years. Once he did his time, Tony had to build back his life.

title: El hombre que no pudo disparar
D3
overview: Vikram, an inspector from Kutralam, stumbles upon a string of bizarre accidents that all seem to follow a strange pattern. But as he digs deeper, he uncovers a medical crime that sends shockwaves through the place.
tagline: A one day journey

title: Crazy 2 Crazy
overview: What happens when a psychopath meets an all-American family of psychopaths?

title: Mango Pickle
overview: Set in the aftermath of Nepal's civil war, a shy middle class teen is manipulated by his friends to visit a brothel, unleashing a chain of events which will change him forever.

title: Casino Caper
overview: Don and Sydney are in over their heads.

title: Da Neighborhood Dopemane
overview: Struggling with his finances working as a mechanic, CrimMane chooses the dope track as his side hustle, until a client offers him a dangerous proposition.

title: Myall Creek: Day of Justice
overview: Based on the story of late 1830's colonial Australia, where an unspeakable crime against First Nations people caused an upheaval between law and order.

title: Entangled
overview: Grace, a police detective, is thrown into a world of the supernatural when she almost dies on a case. To save her life, she makes a deal with a supernatural creature named Mr. Smiley. Months later, Grace is put on a murder case and finds out she is dealing with more of those supernatural creatures.
tagline: What happens when you make a deal for your soul?

title: The Duality Of Can
overview: Two friends turn on each other after discovering a rare artefact beneath a sacred shrine, and must hone their respective skills if they are to fight one another to the death in hopes of claiming it.
tagline: CAN you handle the heat?

title: 3 Shots
overview: After finding a gun in a ravine, three teenagers decide to sell the gun to Peluche, the crazy man from their neighborhood.
tagline: 3 bullets, 3 friends, only 1 destiny.

title: Cinta Pertama Ayah
overview: Amara's life was destroyed in one disastrous night on her best friend's birthday. Not accepting what happened to her daughter, Darma is determined to fight for justice.

title: Spectre: Genesis
overview: The journey begins for The Spectre and The Sentinel.

title: Bean Bandit
overview: Kenichi Sonoda announced at Anime Central that he launched a Kickstarter campaign to fund a new "Bean Bandit" anime. He confirmed that the project will meld elements of Riding Bean and Gunsmith Cats, and like these previous works it will take place in Chicago.

title: Skeet
overview: After being released from prison, Billy Skinner returns to his low-income neighbourhood feeling like a fish out of water; the area has changed dramatically, and what was once a predominantly white neighbourhood is now mostly occupied by refugee families.

title: Jiivi 2
overview: Saravanan restarts his life by marrying Kavitha, the daughter of his house owner, and takes up the job of a share-auto driver. As Mani, his friend, comes back into his life, the cycle of events start again putting Saravanan's life in a challenging situation.

title: Into the Darkness
overview: What led a former top scientist to  rob a bank and hold a dozen hostages? Czech Television's crime thriller based on Martin Goffa's novel "The Little Girl" is squeezed into two environments - the interior of a robbed bank with hostages and the interior of a crisis management car, from where the police communicate with the mysterious attacker and try, like him, to play for time and find out more about him. The flashbacks also tell the story of the attacker's daughter Karin from the recent past, gradually revealing a connection with what is happening in the current storyline.

title: Murder is the Crime
overview: A deranged serial killer is on the loose killing women in Harlem, until an elite homicide squad and detective are on the case.
tagline: Could you be next?

title: Please Kill Me
overview: A girl returning from Canada after 4 years is abducted in Kharar, Punjab. The police is left clueless as the kidnapper is always one step ahead of them.
tagline: A girl returning from Canada after 4 years is abducted in Kharar, Punjab. The police is left clueless as the kidnapper is always one step ahead of them.

title: Camping Fun
overview: Four friends set out to a remote getaway in Texas, unaware that it is being occupied by a sinister cult.
tagline: EVIL CAUGHT ON TAPE

title: Shadows of Betrayal: Chronicles of Ian Blair
overview: Stranded in the hills outside Cypher City, Ian Blair fights to clear his name after being wrongfully accused of his wife's murder. Pursued by mercenaries and evading authorities, he uncovers a web of betrayal and corruption.
tagline: In the shadows, betrayal, unmasks truth.

title: Pay Back
overview: A wealthy property developer goes to the top floor of an art gallery to pay the ransom for his kidnapped son. But when the lift mysteriously stops halfway up the building, he must quickly work out if the young man he is trapped with is just an innocent tourist – or the kidnapper...

title: Mexican Moon
overview: The drug cartels are putting a financial strangle hold on a small Texas town, forcing a Vietnam vet to lose his job at a local garage. He soon learns about one hundred thousand dollars buried by the cartel in a false grave.

title: Hartwig Seeler – Ein neues Leben
overview: The private detective Hartwig Seeler gets an assignment from his former colleague Tascha.

title: Money. Murder. Zurich.: Borchert and the icy death
overview: When Borchert receives an anonymous message that a certain Franz Brosi is innocent, law firm boss Dominique can hardly believe it. After all, Brosi was her first client as a public defender a few years ago and had actually confessed. The two are investigating the case.

title: Home Kills
overview: It's desperate times for a small rural home kills and butchery service, as big business begins to threaten their livelihood the owners fall into offering a new service - killing people, to make ends meet.

title: Charam
overview: Vishwasam, athale ellam.

title: SKY//BLUE
overview: Two activist friends investigate into strange occurrences after they witness a man lose his mind in a bar. While they dig deeper into who the man was, sinister forces converge to control the situation.

title: Dying for a Family
overview: Life with the latest foster family seems good for teenage siblings Darcie and Hannah. But when Hannah disappears without a trace, it’s down to younger sister Darcie to solve the mystery – and save the family from dark truths that threaten to destroy everything.

title: Junior
overview: A cold blooded assassin comes out of six years of hiding when his daughter becomes prey to a heinous plan executed by mafia. The incident stirs up a storm inside Junior and he rampages through the worlds of all culprits to avenge his daughter.
tagline: Biggest man hunt of a man on a hunt

title: Tyler
overview: A young man who loses his job is trapped in a small town that has fallen victim to economic ruin. He resorts to extreme measures to escape and start a new life.

title: Unbestechlich
overview: The inspectors Joseph Kanjaa and Clarissa Jakobs are new to the LKA in Düsseldorf. But not to the delight of their colleagues. Because the two are investigating internally. After a drug operation, cocaine and cash disappeared into the pockets of the police officers involved. Joseph and Clarissa are convinced of that. But they can't prove it. You have to catch Stefan Krohn and his two colleagues in the act. Young Tim...

title: Shororipu 2: Jotugriho
overview: Deputy Commissioner of Police Sharma and his detective friend Chandrakant Sen are called on to investigate the death of veteran music director Debraj Sen. Was his death of Wolff-Parkinson-White syndrome a mere accident? Did his third wife Megha Sen have anything to do with it?
tagline: The burnt house

title: I delitti del BarLume - Mare forza quattro
Heart of the Evil
overview: A woman recounts the events that led her 12 year old son to commit the most ultimate act of evil. Inspired by true events.
tagline: A GRIM STORY.

title: Live and Die in East L.A.
overview: After an E.R. doctor treats an injured boy, he is pulled into the world of gangs and street violence in the underbelly of Los Angeles.
tagline: Choose your path before it chooses you.

title: Cain and Abel
overview: The traumas of childhood differences and disappointments leads two brothers on totally different paths. Finding their way back to one another, will the childhood traumas they've endured be too much and drive them even further apart?
tagline: Then the Lord said to Cain, where is Abel your brother? And he said, I do not know, am I my brother's keeper?

title: Unification of Japan Gaiden: Yamazaki Ichimon
overview: At the same time as Kikumura's disappearance, the Ryuseikai group office was being moved. Himuro (Yasufu Motomiya), who has been strictly told by the landlord of the new group office to use the office quietly, advises the members including Tamura (Yoshiyuki Yamaguchi), but Kawakami (Tatsuya Nakazawa) and Nakajima (Masami Tate) ) and the others ignore his advice and go on a rampage, incurring Himuro's anger.

title: Three Days Later
overview: A dystopian, post-modern retelling of the Easter story.
tagline: Eleven disciples… in hiding.

title: Last Chancers
overview: Flynn finds himself thousands of pounds in debt to the biggest criminal in the county, due to his old friend Aiden's irresponsible behaviour, in this indie comedy set in Gloucestershire.

title: Naan Mirugamaai Maara
overview: Bhoomi, a sound engineer who finds his life as a puzzle when his brother is killed by few gangsters in the city. As Bhoomi decides to take revenge, his life as a common man changes entirely and starts affecting his family big time. Can he protect his family members against all odds?

title: Nenjuku Needhi
overview: An upright city-bred IPS officer investigates a mysterious case of three missing Dalit girls in a rural part of Tamil Nadu. While two are found dead, one is missing without any trace. Can he crack the case and get hold of the culprits?
tagline: Born Equal

title: Hair-Trigger
overview: A young woman is recruited to join a group of novice criminals in an effort to rob a jewelry store. However, after a sudden change of plans, she along with the rest of the group find themselves laying low in the middle of nowhere. Chaos and confusion set in as they find out they may not be alone…
tagline: Midwest criminals meet slasher killers.

title: Der Masuren-Krimi - Fangschuss
overview: A death in the family draws forensic scientist Dr. Viktoria Wex back from Berlin to her childhood home in Poland. But this is not the only reason for her return: Haunted by the recent murder of her husband Felix, Victoria is determined to find out who killed him and why.

title: Harter Brocken: Der Waffendeal
overview: Frank Koops has to deal with a criminal rocker gang and opaque BKA colleagues.

title: Flames of Fury
overview: First barns burn, then an old house burns. A fire brigade goes around. A corpse burned beyond recognition is found in the old house. Intention or amazing coincidence? Franzi Heilmayr and Martin Merana believe in coincidence - until the evidence suddenly points in a completely different direction. And deadly danger still emanates from there.

title: Clint
overview: Clint, a career thief, creates an alter ego through his writing which also helps him cope with his mental health.

title: Uneven Ground: The Melissa Witt Story
overview: Determined to find answers, LaDonna Humphrey and her team spent eight years on a journey like no other. Never before seen case files, interviewing witnesses, potential suspects, and working alongside retired detectives to find justice.
tagline: One Team's Unyielding Quest to Solve a Tragic 30-Year Cold Case

title: Reputation
overview: A drug dealer begins to question his life choices when his violent partner-in-crime is released from prison.

title: Changure Bangaruraja
overview: Bangaruraju, a village mechanic with a mission to regain his family’s lost farmland and dignity, becomes the prime suspect in the murder of his arch-rival, Somu Naidu. He must find the culprit to clear his name, with the race against the time.

title: Sharon and the Vege Plot
overview: A put-upon lady-rabbit called Sharon is left perturbed by a potential plot against her vegetable garden. When Sharon's suspicions put more and more on edge, her obsessions put her own safety and love life at stake.
tagline: As if the rabbit holes weren't deep enough...

title: The Murder of Meredith Kercher
overview: Examining the brutal murder of 21-year-old student Meredith Kercher in 2007.

title: Atlantis
overview: When tomboy taxi-driver Ra'ida's rebellious younger brother Marid goes missing, she turns to her powerful family for help. She is determined to find out who killed her brother and ensure justice, above all, prevails.
tagline: In the city of the lost she went looking for justice.

title: Cobra non è
overview: A crime comedy about the crazy night of a rapper and his manager

title: Rhino Man
overview: RHINO MAN follows the courageous field rangers who risk their lives every day to protect South Africa's rhinos from being poached to extinction.
tagline: Would you risk your life to save a species?

title: Omanush
overview: The story of the film is based on real incidents of how robbers operate their actions—how violent they can get; how terrible and inhumane society considers them. The audience will be able to experience fear, anxiety, and suspense throughout the film. It will teleport the audience to the setting of a jungle, leaving them entertained.
